tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE inventory (
    item_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    item_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    quantity INTEGER NOT NULL,
    supplier VARCHAR(255),
    unit_price DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    item_id INT,
    type VARCHAR(255),
    quantity_change INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);
CREATE TABLE equipment (id INT, name TEXT, quantity INT, price DECIMAL)
CREATE TABLE supplies (id INT, name TEXT, quantity INT, price DECIMAL)
CREATE TABLE categories (id INT, name TEXT)
CREATE TABLE inventory (id INT, item_id INT, item_type TEXT, quantity INT, location TEXT)
CREATE TABLE transactions (id INT, item_id INT, transaction_type TEXT, quantity INT, date TIMESTAMP)
